story-moment.DEVASTATION ON ZEN-WHOBERI: Ebony Maw was with Thanos when he arrived on Zen-Whoberi, speaking to the terrified populace as they were rounded up before half of them were killed.
story-moment.DESTRUCTION OF THE ASGARDIANS: Ebony Maw was with Thanos when he arrived on Zen-Whoberi, speaking to the terrified populace as they were rounded up before half of them were killed.
story-moment.KIDNAPPING DOCTOR STRANGE: In New York, Maw, joined by Cull Obsidian, came for the Time Stone, fighting Iron Man, Doctor Strange and Wong as they sought to protect the stone.
story-moment.SHOWDOWN IN SPACE: Iron Man surprised Maw on his ship, blasting a hole in the hull that sent Maw out into space and to his demise.

powers+abilities.TELEKINESIS: Maw has powerful telekinetic abilities, effortlessly moving large objects with his mind, or quickly causing bricks to be reformed into dangerous spikes.
powers+abilities.LEVITATION: Maw’s telekinesis allows him to levitate with ease, including rotating his entire body upside down.
powers+abilities.MASTER OF TORTURE: Maw’s dark skill set, in service of Thanos, includes knowledge of torture and how to inflict great pain on those he is targeting.
